      • getUserByUserName

        @GetMapping(value="/{username}",
            produces="application/json")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserByUserName(@PathVariable(value="username")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String username)
        Controller layer GET API declaration to retrieve user by username which uses content type 'application/json'
        Parameters:
        username - username of the user whose details has to be retrived
        Returns:
        Response entity to return any object type as a response. Returns success response with userDto object if user exists Otherwise return error response
